Reviews.Title: “Fantastic stay in Paris”
Reviews.Author: Dans062
Reviews.Content: partner recently stayed hotel 3 nights weekend break hotel located quiet annex courtyard notably quieter anyway werent disappointed lovely nice furnishings lovely power shower bathroom hairdryer provided pretty ineffective suggest own ironing board iron wardrobe free safe complaint annex theres lift 2 floors bit drag haul luggage 2 flights stairs kept clean staff friendly reception reception dining immaculate didnt service food cant comment breakfasts ok typical continental style croissants abundance meats bread english boiled eggs boil yourself tried tea wasnt nice stuck coffee staff dining werent friendly spoke english feeling didnt particularly tourists paris lovely thoroughly enjoyed trip visiting usual touristy attractions hotel conveniently placed 57 minute walk nearest metro hesitation recommending looking weekend break beaten track

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel, Great Value”
Reviews.Author: smcooper77
Reviews.Content: stayed awhile ago daughters time days spent clean amenities top reasonably priced friendly front desk breakfast typically french fresh simple delicious croissants cheese selections bang nice little bar evening drink charming patio garden return paris returning 7 minute walk metro loved residential neighbourhood situated genuine slice parisian life

Reviews.Title: “Would recommend this hotel, staff very friendly and professional”

Reviews.Content: stayed march 2012 single perfectly adequate bed comfortable clean free wifi personal iron ironing board breakfast cold meatscheeses variety croissants breads plus fresh orange juice monday friday metro rer 5 minute walk travelling arriving late departing super shuttle service excellent 45 minutes recommend hotel staff friendly professional excellent little restaurant 3 minutes
